revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=CVR100W |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357C0 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H511638J-LCCC |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357C0 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=cisco-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^cisco-[0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=cisco |default_pass=cisco |oui=D8:24:BD |oui_eth=D8:24:BD }} ''Wireless-N 300M Router with Highly Secure Business-class Connectivity for Small Offices/Home Offices (SOHO)''
[http://www.cisco.com/web/CN/solutions/industry/segment_sol/small/products/routers/pdf/CVR100W_Datasheet_OL-26192_en.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/routers/csbr/cvr100w/administration/guide/CVR100W_AG_OL-26942_02.pdf Administration guide]
[http://www.cisco.com/web/CN/solutions/industry/segment_sol/small/products/routers/pdf/CVR100W_OSD_1.0.1.1x.pdf Open source used in the CVR100W] :device is using kernel 2.6.22 [http://www.pcpop.com/doc/0/778/778068_all.shtml Review on '''pcpop.com'''] :'''Broadcom''' BCM5357C0KFBG WiSoC :'''Samsung''' K4H511638J-LCCC RAM :appears to be using a '''Winbond''' serial flash [http://product.pchome.net/network_wireless_router_cisco_ciscocvr100w/pic_358751.html On '''pchome.net'''] (w/ external images) :Serial numbers appear to start with '''CBT1''' (CyberTAN vendor code) [http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201204/show2523362c7p1.html '''''Most humane Router: Cisco CVR100W new wireless router reproduced (Figure)''''' on '''ido.3mt.com.cn'''] (white model) Additional specifications, as per the datasheet, follow.. *Antennas: two internal omni-directional antennas w/ 1.8 dBi gain *Transmit power **802.11b: 17 dBm +- 1.5 dBm **802.11g: 15 dBm +- 1.5 dBm **802.11n: 12.5 dBm +- 1.5 dBm *Receiver sensitivity **-87 dBm @ 11Mbps **-71 dBm @ 54Mbps **-68 dBm @ MSC15, HT20 **-66 dBm @ MCS15, HT40 *Dimensions (WxHxD): [[Dimensions:: 203.7 mm x 169.3 mm x 35.4 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::380 g]] Two models are specified in the datasheet... *CVR100W-B20-K9-CN - Black model *CVR100W-W20-K9-CN - White model Default settings are per '''Cisco''''s admistration guide. :The default SSID format is specified as '''cisco-xxxx'''. The '''xxxx''' ''appears'' to be a 4 digit number. [http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA18149 Wi-Fi Certified] (2013-02-26)
